text:
through a commitment to advance UN SDG 5 to “achieve gender equality and empower all
women and girls” the undertaking may be taking thoughtful measures to include women in the
consultation process with an affected community to meet standards of effective stakeholder
engagement, which can help empower the women in the process itself, but potentially also in
their daily lives.
